name: plugcore-demo
description: Demo for the plug framework of plugcore.com

scripts.test: npx tsc --incremental true && npx plug-test test dist/test configuration | npx pino-pretty -t -i pid,hostname,name
scripts.test:info: npx tsc --incremental true && npx plug-test info dist/test  configuration
scripts.test:clean: npx plug-test test dist/test | npx pino-pretty -t -i pid,hostname,name
scripts.start:dev: npm run start | npx pino-pretty -t -i pid,hostname,name
